Class RulesOfInferenceParserTopdown

  • java.lang.Object
    • properties.RulesOfInferenceParserTopdown
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Parser

    public class RulesOfInferenceParserTopdown
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parser, java.io.Serializable
    Parser that implements rules of inference to gather all Has, K and B statements from an Architecture_Class object.
    See Also:
